entry.title: Ukraine Targets Key Bridge, Prepares Counteroffensive in South
entry.content: Ukraine struck for the second day in a row the strategic bridge linking Russian-occupied Kherson with the rest of the Russian-held areas in southern Ukraine, part of preparations for a counteroffensive.

entry.title: Putin's Gas Game: Toy With Europe's Supply and Make Its Leaders Squirm
entry.content: The Kremlin is weaponizing energy over Ukraine sanctions, a gambit that carries huge risks for both sides as customers race to lock in alternative sources.

entry.title: Record-Breaking Heat Scorches Europe
entry.content: Extreme heat has swept through Europe over the past week, with thousands of people evacuated from their homes as wildfires broke out in swaths of the regionâ€™s south.
